General.Name: Cohen Dev
General.Description: Cohen Development Gas & Oil Ltd. engages in the exploration, development, and production of oil and natural gas properties. It holds interests in the Ashkelon, Noa, Tamar, Dalit, North Whale, South Whale, Block 12, Shark, Crocodile, New Horizon, and New Yahel. The company was incorporated in 1958 and is based in Bnei Brak, Israel.
General.Address: 30 Sheshet Hayamim Street, Bnei Brak, Israel, 5120261
